DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Take and deal 1 extra damage per Berserk stack. Certain cards gain new effects based on Berserk.
Drain your Ego to debuff your enemies or force their actions.
Mana burned enemies lose HP when  casting buffs, debuffs and spells.
